text: Nguyena owanenza ukuba ngabalandelayo ngokuhlala emhlabeni. Ngakho-ke noma ngabe ngubani ongakholwa kukuyena ukungakholwa kwakhe futhi akubanezezeli abangakholwa ukungakholwa kwabo eNkosini yabo ngaphandle kokunengeka futhi akubanezeleli (ngalutho) abangakholwa ukungakholwa kwabo ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa
